ROOT.NAME: Item exception
ROOT.QUERY: /** ********************************************************** */ /* Item PPG with missing Ads retail */ /** ********************************************************** */ WITH ITEM_LIST AS (SELECT * FROM artdetlist@heinens_custom_prod WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) BETWEEN dliddeb AND dlidfin AND dlinlis LIKE ''PPG%'') SELECT l1.dlinlis || '' | '' || elilibl "PPG # desc", uv1.arvcexr || ''/'' || uv1.arvcexv || '' '' || pkstrucobj.get_desc(1,uv1.arvcinr,''HN'') "Item/SV code desc", pkartcoca.Get_Arccode@heinens_custom_prod(1,l1.dlicinv) "UPC", '' $'' || aviprix || ''/'' || avimulti "Retail", avintar || '' ['' || to_char(aveddeb, ''MM/DD/RR'') || ''-'' || to_char(avedfin, ''MM/DD/RR'') || '']'' "Price list", uv2.arvcexr || ''/'' || uv2.arvcexv || '' '' || pkstrucobj.get_desc@heinens_custom_prod(1,uv2.arvcinr,''HN'') "Item/SV code desc with no retail", pkartcoca.Get_Arccode@heinens_custom_prod(1,l2.dlicinv) "UPC (no retail)", ''-'' "Retail " FROM ITEM_LIST l1, ITEM_LIST l2, aveprix@heinens_custom_prod s1, avetar@heinens_custom_prod, artuv@heinens_custom_prod uv1, artuv@heinens_custom_prod uv2, artentlist@heinens_custom_prod WHERE l1.dlinlis=l2.dlinlis AND l1.dlicinv != l2.dlicinv AND uv1.arvcinv=l1.dlicinv AND uv2.arvcinv=l2.dlicinv AND s1.avintar=aventar AND s1.avicinv=l1.dlicinv AND elinlis=l1.dlinlis AND avestat=2 /* Promo */ AND avedfin > TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) AND s1.avidfin > TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artuc@heinens_custom_prod, artvl@heinens_custom_prod WHERE araseqvl=arlseqvl AND arlcinluvc=l2.dlicinv AND avedfin > TRUNC(araddeb) AND TRUNC(aradfin)> aveddeb AND pkresrel.isSiteBelongToNode@heinens_custom_prod(1,arasite,''1100'',''1'')=1) /* Not an old item */ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artuc@heinens_custom_prod, artvl@heinens_custom_prod WHERE araseqvl=arlseqvl AND arlcinluvc=l2.dlicinv AND TRUNC(SYSDATE-30) BETWEEN araddeb AND aradfin AND pkresrel.isSiteBelongToNode@heinens_custom_prod(1,arasite,''1100'',''1'')=1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM aveprix@heinens_custom_prod s2 WHERE s2.avintar=aventar AND s2.avicinv=l2.dlicinv AND TRUNC(aveddeb+1) BETWEEN s2.aviddeb AND s2.avidfin) ORDER BY avintar ASC
